title: Bug 116829 - Label height doesn't change with label font modification.
description:
Description: Label font size doesn't change right away when it is modified. Steps to reproduce:
1. Modify the font size of a label.
2. Observe the label's height.
OB: When the font size of a label is modified, the label's height does not change immediately.
EB: The label's height should be adjusted proportionally to the font size when it is modified.
SR:
1. Open the application.
2. Modify the font size of a label.
3. Observe the label's height.
